name: Observatorio PIRNA CIESAS
description: Portal of a research observatory likely related to Indigenous Peoples of North America, operated by CIESAS (Centro de Investigaciones y Estudios Superiores en Antropología Social), providing social, anthropological, scientific, and possibly geographic data catalogues; exact contents need deeper inspection of the site.
owner_name: Centro de Investigaciones y Estudios Superiores en Antropología Social (CIESAS)
